thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 22 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Nordson Corporation Q1 GAAP Earnings Per Share $1.78

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Nordson Corporation Q1 GAAP Earnings Per Share $1.78
text:
Feb 22 (Reuters) - Nordson Corp:
* REPORTS RECORD FIRST QUARTER SALES, OPERATING PROFIT, DILUTED EARNINGS PER SHARE, AND EBITDA
* Q1 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.35 * Q1 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.78 * Q1 SALES ROSE 35 PERCENT TO $550 MILLION * SEES Q2 2018 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.33 TO $1.47 * SEES Q2 2018 SALES UP 9 TO 13 PERCENT * BACKLOG FOR QUARTER ENDED JANUARY 31, 2018 WAS APPROXIMATELY $405 MILLION, AN INCREASE OF 24 PERCENT COMPARED TO SAME PERIOD A YEAR AGO
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.34, REVENUE VIEW $538.8 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.49, REVENUE VIEW $548.0 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
